person.persName: Louise Cabois Berthe Ballard (Widow of slave trader Rice Carter Ballard)

body.p: Born in Natchez, Mississippi. Married Rice Carter Ballard c1840. He was a slave trader based in Richmond, VA, in partnership with the large slave trading firm of Isaac Franklin and John Armfield. Louise Berthe Ballard and her husband lived in Louisville, Kentucky, near their several plantations in the Mississippi Valley. They had three children: Ella Ballard, born 1841, and twins, Ann Carter Ballard and Charlotte Berthe Ballard, born 1847.
